ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The true history of Lullaby, it's problems, it's if xes and it's nerfs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... exactly ... and I could not disagree more.  Being able to twist one song and Lullaby or being able to use weapons and Lullaby would not make us anywhere
ygData.messageBody:
>that's the whole point. if we could lullaby and do other stuff, we'd have
exactly
>the same power as an enchanter to ae mez (and gained at a much lower level)
and

I could not disagree more. Being able to twist one song and Lullaby or
being able to use weapons and Lullaby would not make us anywhere near as
good at crowd control as Enchanters. Our mobs would get a chance to resist
mez every six seconds in option 2 or every 12 seconds in option 1.
Enchanters can mez things for nearly a minute in one cast. Also AoE mez is
only a 16th level Enchanter spell, so us getting Lullaby at 15th hardly
qualifies it as much lower level.

>lullaby situation. so you hit lullaby, hit assist, hit 'a', and now what?
you do
>exactly the same as you would if you had a lute instead of weapons. you
sit
>and watch the screen. you could just as easily go get a sandwich then too.

I can't make a sandwich before a full group kills a mob. In fact I'd have
trouble making it upstairs and back down to the computer with a soda before
it would be time to switch mobs.

Kit
